channel.title: Alright, a problem with action buttons
channel.description: Ok, I'm working with selectoption, I have this in my runserver.bat [code] Starting LeScape Pk V2 on 0.0.0.0:1337ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:247 7Le Hawtz is signing onto server.[client-1-Le Hawtz]: Unhandled packet [40, Inte rFaceId: 5014, size=2]: ]16 3B[ [client-1-Le Hawtz]: Action Button: 19022 [client-1-Le Hawtz]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 5014, size=2]: ]16 38[ [client-1-Le Hawtz]: Action Button: 19022 [/code] then under clicking most buttons I add a case [code] case 19022: sendMessage("testing"); break; [/code] and nothing happens.. :S

also newb, i have a problem with my arrow making if you dont mind fixing it, ill pm you the code

item.title: Alright, a problem with action buttons
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Ok, I’m working with selectoption, I have this in my runserver.bat

Starting LeScape Pk V2 on 0.0.0.0:1337ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:247
7Le Hawtz is signing onto server.[client-1-Le Hawtz]: Unhandled packet [40, Inte
rFaceId: 5014, size=2]: ]16 3B[
[client-1-Le Hawtz]: Action Button: 19022
[client-1-Le Hawtz]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 5014, size=2]: ]16 38[
[client-1-Le Hawtz]: Action Button: 19022

then under clicking most buttons I add a case

case 19022:
sendMessage("testing");
break;

and nothing happens… :S

Read full topic
